page.shortlink: grid properties security security model property
page.description: Used when porting older projects built with Alpha Five Version 7 or earlier. Newer applications use the Group Based security model.
page.discussion: Choose level-based security for compatibility with versions prior to Version 8. Choose group-based to use the Version 8 and newer web security system. Do not change this setting unless you are porting an older application into Alpha Anywhere.

item.name: Group Based
item.description: Default. This is the model used in th Alpha Anywhere.

item.name: Level Based
item.description: Security model used in Alpha Five Version 7 and older. This option is only available for compatibility with version of Alpha Anywhere older than Alpha Five Version 8.

page.warning: Grid Components built with Alpha Anywhere should use *[Group Based]* security.
